thread.title: Akhil to sizzle with his dances
thread.title_full: Akhil to sizzle with his dances - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Akhil to sizzle with his dances
text: Akkineni Akhil's debut film is one of the highly anticipated films this season. Titled Akhil, the film is being directed by VV. Vinayak and produced by actor Nithiin. It will hit the screens on October 22. The handsome Akkineni lad has been the cynosure of the audience ever since the project was launched. Everyone is very eager to watch his on-screen performance. Also, the question is whether Akhil can mesmerize the audience with his superb dance moves. Already, the trailers and video snippets caught on well with the audience and everyone is expecting that he is going to set the dance floor on fire. In a couple of songs, he was seen effortlessly shaking his legs with a lot of verve and flexibility. Needless to say, Akhil will cast a magic spell on the audience with his dance moves. Currently, the last song shoot is progressing in Hyderabad. With this, the entire shooting part will be wrapped up.Debutante Sayeesha Saigal is sharing the screen space with Akhil.
